channel.title: Bootstrapped.fm, Episode 57
channel.description:
[Episode 57][1] is now available, in which we discuss returning for another season, first day of school, finishing up consulting work and returning to product work, co-founding a new company, [HelpSpot][2] 4, having a full-time sales person, [Snappy][3], [Quantic Insights][4], programmers and math, mobile apps for kids, Star Wars, Mad Max, and home theater setup.
[1]: http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-57/ [2]: http://www.helpspot.com [3]: http://www.besnappy.com [4]: http://www.quanticinsights.com

item.title: Bootstrapped.fm, Episode 57
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
Great to have you guys back on air. No, air is not right. On device? Or on electron? Whatever.

Read full topic
